author: Rob Maaddi / AP
title: NFL Players Set to Begin Preseason Workouts — From Home
description: The NFL and its players union have agreed to conduct “virtual” offseason workout programs due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
The NFL and its players union have agreed to conduct “virtual” offseason workout programs due to the COVID-19 pandemic until every team is permitted to open its facilities.
Teams can hold voluntary classroom instruction, workouts and non-football educational… [+1716 chars]
